items.name: Shaper's Touch
explicitMods: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies Regenerate 34 Mana per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby Allies have +2% to Critical Strike Multiplier
You and nearby allies have 39% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.typeLine: Awakened Cast On Critical Strike Support
socketedItems.baseType: Awakened Cast On Critical Strike Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both an attack skill and a spell skill to work. The attack skill will trigger a spell when it critically strikes an enemy. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 7% less Spell Damage
Supported Attacks will Trigger a Supported Spell when you Crit an Enemy
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Supported Skills have 23% increased Attack Critical Strike Chance
Supported Spells have 25% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Supported Skills have 23% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance

items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 15% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

and left a mountain of twitching dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Reserves mana to apply a buff and leave afterimages of your recent past. Cast the spell again to return to the oldest afterimage, teleporting to that location as well as resetting your Life, Mana and Energy Shield to the values they had then.
explicitMods: Buff grants 5% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified
Buff makes you Unaffected by Temporal Chains
